---
title: "toxicities"
format: html
editor: visual
---

```{r}
x <- read.csv("../data/clinical_for-TruDiag.csv")

head(x)
```

```{r}
tox <- 
  x %>%
  select(patient.id, ends_with("_grade")) %>%
  gather(-patient.id, key = "visit", value = "grade") %>%
  drop_na(grade) %>%
  mutate(patient.id = as.factor(patient.id))

head(tox)
```

```{r}
tox %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = grade, y = patient.id)) +
  geom_point()
```
